DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this observational, comparative safety study is to evaluate the safety of the Novartis Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) vaccine in pregnant women and their off spring, followed for up to 3 months of age as compared to pregnant women who have not received the Novartis Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) vaccine. This study will be conducted at investigative sites within the Netherlands, Italy, and Argentina.
DOC.brief_title: Novartis Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) Vaccine(s) Observational Comparative Safety Study
DOC.criteria: Currently pregnant OR was pregnant following the introduction of the Novartis Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) vaccine in the country of interest and have already experienced a pregnancy outcome Consents to participate in the study Is not currently pregnant OR was not pregnant at the time of or after the introduction of the Novartis Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) vaccine in the country of interest Does not consent to participate in the study Has received a nonNovartis pandemic influenza vaccinee
